todos.title: Set up TypeScript configuration with tsconfig.json including strict mode and proper module resolution settings
todos.description: Configure tsconfig.json with strict mode and proper module resolution

todos.title: Create comprehensive API documentation for all REST endpoints using OpenAPI/Swagger specification format
todos.description: Document all REST endpoints with OpenAPI/Swagger

todos.title: Implement centralized error logging system using Sentry or similar service for production monitoring and debugging
todos.description: Add centralized error logging with Sentry or similar service

todos.title: Implement API rate limiting mechanism to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage across all endpoints
todos.description: Add API rate limiting to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage

todos.title: Design and implement the main user dashboard UI with customizable widgets and responsive layout
todos.description: Design and implement the main user dashboard with widgets

todos.title: Add dark mode support with theme switching functionality allowing users to toggle between dark and light modes
todos.description: Implement theme switching with dark/light mode options

todos.title: Set up comprehensive monitoring alerts for system downtime and performance issues with notification channels
todos.description: Configure alerts for system downtime and performance issues

todos.title: Implement data export feature allowing users to download their data in CSV and JSON formats
todos.description: Allow users to export their data in CSV and JSON formats

todos.title: Review and update all npm packages to latest stable versions ensuring security and compatibility
todos.description: Review and update all npm packages to latest stable versions

todos.title: Create Kanban board view for todo-viewer.html with drag-and-drop support for organizing todos by status columns
todos.description: Add a Kanban board view to the todo-viewer.html with drag-and-drop support for organizing todos by status columns

todos.title: Check if todo-viewer.html requires local server or can load todos.json directly despite CORS
todos.description: Investigate whether the viewer needs a local HTTP server to fetch todos.json or if there's an alternative approach to load the data when opening the HTML file directly
